original_text: You came down on Mount Sinai and spoke with them from heaven and gave them right rules and true laws, good statutes and commandments,
korean_text: 또 시내 산에 강림하시고 하늘에서부터 그들과 말씀하사 정직한 규례와 진정한 율법과 선한 율례와 계명을 그들에게 주시고

sentences.original_text: You came down on Mount Sinai
and spoke with them from heaven
and gave them right rules and true laws,
